headline: Wells Fargo Raises Globe Life (GL) Target, Keeps Overweight Rating
summary: Globe Life Inc. (NYSE:GL) is one of the Top 10 Stocks Warren Buffett Would Buy in 2026. On February 25, 2026, Wells Fargo analyst Elyse Greenspan raised the price target on Globe Life Inc. (NYSE:GL) from $170 to $171 while keeping an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm is lowering earnings estimates for most […]
